items.title: It’s Now Easier for Millions of Americans to Get a Tax Break for Donating to Charity

items.title: Minimum-Wage Workers in These 19 States Just Got a Raise
items.description: The federal minimum wage of $7.25 per hour has not budged since 2009, essentially leaving it to states to set meaningful minimum wage increases.
